title: Who surrenders in ranked?
body:
REALLY WHO DOES THAT? I don't care if you fed velkoz, you made your bed you lie in it. Or so what if there is an afk, 4v5's have been won. I'm sick of tired of whiny teams with no motivation to get any better. They are just like, "well it's only 21 lp" THAT'S 30-40 minutes of your life gone btw. And you got to waste another 30--40 minutes getting it back. So JUST DON'T SURRENDER, plebs.

/end rant

replies.body: If you value your LP you'd try to win instead of forfeit a game.
I get like 20 lp a win and 10 for a loss. So I'd rather just ff when I get a useless team
People that are using their time wisely and want to climb their ladder, sometimes the risk isn't worth the time wasted on the game.
Ive had plenty of bad games, everyone does.  If all of the lanes lose, the same mistakes are made, no one is communicating, I always FF right at 20.

for starters if you lose 21 lp your acc is already ruined as far as ranked goes.

Now for the main reason of my comment people wanna end fast because the game is only enjoyable if you are winning atm and the procces of making a comeback atm is stressfull. We litterally open mid if the enemy gets a triple and 1st blood (tower) even if the score is 1-3 lul in mid diamond and i dont even wanna know how it is in masters/chal anymore.
And this is why ranked is a joke this season. Impossible to actually get anywhere when everything is determined by how many kids you get matched with.
Nope, I'm not going to fight against their 30/1 Draven that almost 1 shots everyone including tanks.
Because you fed him probably. Sucks when you have to lane against your fed opponent. Stop dying noob.

> [{quoted}](name=I make dem flash,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XGQhsGj3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-02-09T01:06:15.022+0000)
>
> Because you fed him probably. Sucks when you have to lane against your fed opponent. Stop dying noob.

Oh sorry I forgot that you never feed or make mistakes.  My bad.
What if I'm Top and Draven was ADC? What do you say about that?

I don't like how you got your point across here but i agree with you to some extent. I dont like to surrender i do every now and then but not very common im a firm believer in comebacks. If i have someone toxic on my team that spams surrender im not gonna surrender. If im strong or if someone on my team is strong im gonna keep playing and play around the most fed person on my team. Yes some games are absolute beat downs i understand but there are times when comebacks are fully possible. Dont give up.

And you got to waste another 30--40 minutes getting it back. So JUST DON&#039;T SURRENDER, plebs.

It's 30-40 minutes of my life gone anyway.   Whether we win or lose, league is just a game.  Whether we win or lose, we have nothing to show for it.

You're expecting weak-minded participation trophy kids to do things that actually requires effort.  Trying is just to hard for most of them.  They would rather quit and rest their laurels and their hopes on the "easy" games.

You can't expect the weak to be strong anymore than you can tarnish a rusted blade.
